title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Wildflowers
body: Wildflowers       There are many wonders at Mount Rushmore besides the four presidents carved on the mountain. Take a walk along the trails and see nature's beauty.  Download this PDF to learn about traditional uses of some of the plants and flowers found here.   Below is also a gallery of some of the more common wildflowers you might see.  Â                 Wildflowers at Mount Rushmore.   5 Photos  Commonly seen wildflowers.
